prompt.Notes App: Complete design of a desktop notes application. The left sidebar displays a list of notes that can be searched and created. Note items can be selected and deleted. The right side area displays the content of the selected note from the left sidebar in real-time and provides rich text editing functionality (implemented via the third-party library Quill), with real-time saving when editing notes
prompt.Advanced Calendar Component: Fully implement a calendar component with memos. When a user selects a date, the memo content for that date is displayed below the calendar, shown in a multiline input box with a 'Submit' button. By default, the calendar selects today's date. The selected date and dates with existing memos should be visually highlighted
prompt.Todo List: Design a todo list component that allows users to set priorities when creating todo items. Added todo items can be marked as complete by checking a checkbox, and can be directly renamed and deleted
prompt.Login Registration Form: Create a mobile login and registration form. The login and registration forms should be displayed independently, and users can switch between login and registration interfaces by clicking option tabs at the top
prompt.Pomodoro Timer: Complete design of a Pomodoro timer with start, pause, and reset functions. The countdown display part uses a tomato icon (iconify: twemoji:tomato) as the background at the lower layer. Operation buttons are represented by icons and displayed outside the tomato background
prompt.Rich Text Editor: Generate a rich text editor, calling some third-party libraries (such as Quill) to implement complex functions
prompt.Drawing Board: Generate a drawing board that allows selecting brush thickness and color, and provides clear, undo, and redo operations
prompt.Timer: Design a timer that supports reset and split recording functions, with split recording results displayed below and operation buttons represented by icons
prompt.Calendar Component: Create a calendar component where users can view and select dates. It requires month switching functionality and the current date to be highlighted
prompt.Search Box: Create a mobile search box. The placeholder text is 'Search...'. When text is entered, a clear button is displayed
prompt.Snake Game: Implement a playable Snake game with a black background. Use arrow keys to control the snake's movement. Provide a 'Start Game' button. When the game ends, display a toast message in the center of the screen
prompt.Weather Card: Design an exquisite and beautiful weather card showing Beijing's weather for today and the next 3 days, using colorful icons to indicate weather types
prompt.File Upload Area: Generate a file upload area component that displays the filename after successful upload
prompt.Star Rating Control: Create an interactive star rating control
prompt.Mobile Navigation Bar: Generate a mobile bottom navigation bar containing four icon buttons: 'Home', 'Discover', 'Messages', and 'Profile'. Each button displays the corresponding label text below it, and buttons should have click state highlighting effects
prompt.Music Player: Complete design of a music player with playback controls and a progress bar. Loop play three songs from the internet (soundhelix), with song covers from Picsum. In addition to displaying the cover of the currently playing song, the entire player's background should be set to a blurred effect of the current song's cover
prompt.Chat Interface: Generate an exquisite mobile chat interface with avatars from Picsum
prompt.2048 Game: Fully implement a playable 2048 game (4x4 grid) that allows restarting the game
prompt.Whack-a-Mole Game: Fully implement a playable Whack-a-Mole game. Keep the mouse cursor style always as a hammer emoji (emoji called from twemoji.maxcdn.com), and moles are also represented by emojis. After clicking the start button, within the countdown (30s), moles appear randomly and increasingly fast at any position in the nine-grid. When hitting a mole, there should be visual feedback, and score should be recorded
prompt.Text Player: Design a text player that provides start, pause, replay, and speed adjustment controls to play the content in the text input box, with operation buttons represented by icons
